name: Turtle I
description: Peachy suntan lotion, but in a good way...
author: Queuetue

reviews.text: Mixed this with 3% Flavorah Peach Gummy, very good mix
Really tasty! Not too sweet but sweet enough! Just Peachy! Thank you! :)
It's an okay vape, but I won't be mixing it again.  Maybe I'm just not a big Juicy Peach fan or...

I was looking for an easy tasty shake n vape and I found it with this recipe. I can't wait to see what the next few days bring with this one because I know the Juicy Peach will settle just a bit and I bet it gets even better.  Thanks for this one my friend!
